history.proof: intros. unfold ex_derive, derivable_pt in *. destruct H as [l H]. exists l. strivial use: is_derive_Reals unfold: derivable_pt_abs.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x, l : R H : derivable_pt_abs f x l Unable to unify "derivable_pt_abs f x l" with "is_derive f x l".

original: intros f x H. unfold ex_derive, derivable_pt in *. destruct H as [l H]. exists l. apply H.
